entries.category: Gaining Access to the Hunting Grounds
entries.journal_entry_description: Kerssoc wants you to reduce the number of Chiss poachers in the area.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Kerssoc wants you to reduce the number of Chiss poachers in the area. Attack their camp and kill 21 of them.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Kerssoc and let him know you've finished your attack on the Chiss poacher camp.
